ygData.subject: Re: Get Megatron
ygData.msgSnippet: DarkMouse:: She looked at Killfest. She was wondering just how much she could trust him. She wondered if she told him about the clone, would he help her? Or

DarkMouse::

She looked at Killfest. She was wondering just how much she could 
trust him. She wondered if she told him about the clone, would he 
help her? Or would he destroy it. She knew he would figure out sooner 
or later. So she decided to tell him now. "There is one more thing 
Commander Killfest."


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Killfest::
> 
> Killfest frowns and raises an eyebrow. Diamond was obvioustly 
holding 
> something back.
> 
> "Very well," he says, "If there's no one else than we have to wait 
> for this Blacknightmare to respond."
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> > DarkMouse::
> > 
> > She got up and stood, looking at Killfest. "If he's that easily 
> > bored, he should go to the pod hanger bay. Perhaps he could 
remove 
> > the old and scrapped pods." She said with a slight smirk.
> > 
> > She shook her head."I can't think of anything right now, other 
> > than..." she stopped herself, "no, I can't think of anything."
